title: The. xv. bookes of P. Ouidius Naso, entytuled Metamorphosis, translated oute of Latin into English meeter, by Arthur Golding Gentleman, a worke very pleasaunt and delectable. 1567.
author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
